A

AID - Static variable in class org.eclipse.keyple.example.common.calypso.HoplinkInfoAndSampleCommands
Hoplink card AID

C

CSM_C1_ATR_REGEX - Static variable in class org.eclipse.keyple.example.common.calypso.HoplinkInfoAndSampleCommands
CSM C1 regular expression: platform, version and serial number values are ignored

D

Demo_HoplinkTransactionEngine - Class in org.eclipse.keyple.example.common.calypso
This Calypso demonstration code consists in: Setting up a two-reader configuration and adding an observer method (update) Starting a card operation when a PO presence is notified (operatePoTransactions) Opening a logical channel with the CSM (C1 CSM is expected) see (CSM_C1_ATR_REGEX) Attempting to open a logical channel with the PO with 3 options: Selection with a fake AID Selection with a Navigo AID Selection with a Hoplink AID Display SeRequest/SeResponse data (printSelectAppResponseStatus) If the Hoplink selection succeeded, do an Hoplink transaction (Demo_HoplinkTransactionEngine.doHoplinkReadWriteTransaction(PoSecureSession, ApduResponse, boolean) doHoplinkReadWriteTransaction}).
Demo_HoplinkTransactionEngine() - Constructor for class org.eclipse.keyple.example.common.calypso.Demo_HoplinkTransactionEngine
 
Demo_ObservableReaderNotificationEngine - Class in org.eclipse.keyple.example.common.generic
 
Demo_ObservableReaderNotificationEngine() - Constructor for class org.eclipse.keyple.example.common.generic.Demo_ObservableReaderNotificationEngine
 
Demo_ObservableReaderNotificationEngine.SpecificPluginObserver - Class in org.eclipse.keyple.example.common.generic
This method is called whenever a Plugin event occurs (reader insertion/removal)
Demo_ObservableReaderNotificationEngine.SpecificReaderObserver - Class in org.eclipse.keyple.example.common.generic
This method is called whenever a Reader event occurs (SE insertion/removal)
doHoplinkReadWriteTransaction(PoSecureSession, ApduResponse, boolean) - Method in class org.eclipse.keyple.example.common.calypso.Demo_HoplinkTransactionEngine
Do an Hoplink transaction: Process opening Process PO commands Process closing
